title: Delhi HC indicates it will pass injunction order to protect Hrithik Roshan's personality rights
description: The Delhi High Court on Wednesday indicated that it would pass an injunction order restraining the misuse of actor Hrithik Roshan's personality rights for monetary gains, including the use of artificial intelligence (AI) and creation of disparaging content.

title: AI Chatbots That Talk Like Humans Pose Threat To India's Call-Centre Workers
description: At a startup office in this Indian city, developers are fine-tuning artificial-intelligence chatbots that talk and message like humans.
content:
Bengaluru:
At a startup office in this Indian city, developers are fine-tuning artificial-intelligence chatbots that talk and message like humans.

title: Apocalypse Now? Why the media are suddenly freaking out about AI
description: AI pioneer Yoshua Bengio warns artificial intelligence could engineer lethal pathogens, with experts estimating a 25% chance of AI destroying civilization.
content:
NEWYou can now listen to Fox News articles!
"The A.I. Prompt That Could End the World," the New York Times warns ominously.
Actually, that’s way too weak a word. It’s… pretty frightening.

title: Foundations want to curb AI developers' influence with US$500mil aimed at centering human needs
description: Artificial intelligence is a matter of design – not destiny. That's the message from ten philanthropic foundations aiming to loosen the grip that the technology's moneyed developers, fueled by an investing frenzy, hold over its evolution.
content:
NEW YORK: Artificial intelligence is a matter of design – not destiny.

description: Sci-fi author Ken Liu shares his unique perspective on artificial intelligence as a creative tool and its impact on human artists, ahead of his keynote at SWF. Read more at straitstimes.com.

title: Australia falling behind as experts call for AI urgency
description: The juice will be worth the squeeze for workers and businesses if Australia quickly and carefully forges on with artificial intelligence, industry figures say.
content:
Leaders in artificial intelligence warn Australia is falling behind and national productivity gains rest on embracing the technology.

title: Goldman Tells Staff It Will Cut More Jobs as AI Saves Costs
description: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. told staffers to expect an additional round of job cuts this year as the bank seeks further savings across its businesses and takes advantage of the opportunities presented by artificial intelligence.
